summary: This retexture mod changes Vampire\'s eyes to a lightning blue.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This retexture mod changes Vampire\'s eyes to a lightning blue. 

Installation procedure: 
Extract the compressed file to your usual Data folder and play.

Bugs:
None, just don\'t use another vampire eye replacement.

Additional notes:
If you liked my file, please endorse it!
Special thanks to my girlfriend, for wanting \"Paxton\" eyes for my Paxy character in Skyrim. This is how it came to my mind to make such mod.
author: shoni89P
